mapper.insert: insert into admins (id, section_id, name, realname, email, password, crypt, phone, lasttime, lastip, status, created_at, updated_at) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sectionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crypt,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lasttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update admins set section_id = #{sectionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, realname = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, crypt = #{crypt,jdbcType=CHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lasttime = #{lasttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, lastip = #{lastip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, section_id, name, realname, email, password, crypt, phone, lasttime, lastip, status, created_at, updated_at from admins where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, section_id, name, realname, email, password, crypt, phone, lasttime, lastip, status, created_at, updated_at from admins
